title: Tank Fairy
description: Jojo is a lonely ten-year-old who dreams of dancing and drag. Outcast by classmates and misunderstood by his mum, Jojo's life is upended by a fierce fairy godmother who delivers propane tanks to his apartment building. A surreal, camp, glittery musical extravaganza.
notes: UNCERTAIN: Source line reads 'Premiere Status English'; unclear whether this is a valid premiere status or malformed metadata.
